title: Logix 12535 Stackable Craft Storage Box with Handle, Locking Art Supply , Plastic Containers with Lids, Craft Organizer , Frost
description: The Logix Craft Box is ideal for stacking, organizing, and storing arts and crafts supplies, making this hard plastic storage box an excellent choice for artists. These small storage containers are also perfect for keeping souvenirs, memorabilia, keepsakes, and other valuables safe. Our small plastic containers with lids feature two tamper-proof locking options (locks not included), eliminating prying and keeping stored items secure. The base-to-lid interlocking system on these craft room organizers and storage containers provides superior stackability and reduces tipping. This waterproof art bin comes with a compression-fit lid that keeps dust and moisture away from supplies and valuables that are tucked inside the plastic container, ensuring that your items remain in great condition for as long as you need them. These durable storage totes with lids can be taken anywhere and come with a handle for easy transport. The small storage bins with lids are the perfect size for portability, and these small plastic storage bins can even be used by kids at home or in school. Our plastic storage bins with lids are proudly made in the U.S.A.
